title: Which plugin for identifying crypto algorithms in IDA Pro 6.9?
content: I stumbled upon findcrypt2 but it seems not to work anymore. Is there a new version of findcryp2 anywhere or are there similar plugins which are able to identify different crypto algorithms by checking specific constants etc.?

answers_data.content: Try IDAsignsrch , or the original commandline version .

comments.text: Does it work for anyone here on Mac OS X El Capitan? Either I'm too stupid to get it running or it's not working on OS X.

answers_data.content:
I was going to recommend IDAScope but it is broken in 6.9 as well. PySide has been dropped by IDA in favor of PyQT in 6.9.

Edit: Thanks to Daniel Plohmann, the plugin now supports IDA 6.9. You can see the fixed code here: committed 2fdeed1

comments.text: I will be looking into the necessary adaptions to make IDAscope work with PyQt instead of PySide in the next two weeks. :)
Thanks @pnx for updating the plugin. Edited my comment above.
